nodes.text: Treston Lines, Ltd. was a large company based on the planet Bespin in Cloud City. The company was known as a major cargo transport company, and the heads of the company were given positions in the city's ruling class, the Exex. They were one of the companies, alongside Bioniip Laboratories and Vew-Grek Holo Images, that called for Cloud City to declare its allegiance to the Galactic Empire.
